content: Daniele Comi is a Data Scientist, AI Engineer, and Software Engineer at IBM Italy, with over three years of experience in data analytics, machine learning (ML), and deep learning. His expertise spans the entire spectrum of AI, from architectural design to scientific research, with a focus on machine, reinforcement, and deep learning. Daniele holds a Master's degree in Computer Science Engineering, specializing in AI frameworks and models. At IBM, Daniele has been a key member of the AI and Generative AI team in Italy, where he has designed and implemented complex AI and generative AI architectures for a variety of industry applications. His technical expertise also includes Fully Homomorphic Encrypted AI, enabling secure AI solutions that ensure data privacy. Note: Other books in this series are:  Simplify Your AI Journey: Ensuring Trustworthy AI with IBM watsonx.governance, SG24-8573  Simplify Your AI Journey: Unleashing the Power of AI with IBM watsonx.ai, SG24-8574 Foreword xiii
